backend/main.mo: Motoko actor implementing a job management system for a pencil sketch pipeline, with endpoints to create, process, retry, and query jobs, including rate limiting and blob storage integration.
feature_evidence.json: Empty feature evidence report JSON file with no recorded features.
frontend-file-summaries.txt: JSON document containing short summaries of each frontend source file, describing their roles in the pencil sketch art guide application.
frontend/index.css: Global Tailwind CSS entry point defining light and dark mode CSS custom properties for the design system color tokens (background, foreground, card, border, chart colors, sidebar, etc.).
frontend/index.html: Minimal HTML shell for the Vite/React app, setting the page title to 'HILSA-ART GUIDE' and mounting the React root via main.tsx.
frontend/src/App.tsx: Root React component that configures TanStack Router with five routes (Home, HowItWorks, Docs, Contact, Results/$id), wraps them in a shared RootLayout with Header/Footer, and provides ThemeProvider and Sonner toasts.
frontend/src/components/Footer.tsx: Site footer component with brand logo, navigation links (including Docs), and social media icon links for Instagram, X, and Behance.
frontend/src/components/GalleryView.tsx: Gallery component that generates and displays four progressive pencil sketch stages client-side (with session caching), falls back to backend-provided stage images when available, and supports grid/cards view modes with a downloadable tutorial grid.
frontend/src/components/Header.tsx: Renders a fixed top navigation header with a logo, desktop nav links, a 'Start Creating' CTA button, and a responsive mobile hamburger menu using TanStack Router for navigation.
Provides a drag-and-drop image upload UI that validates files, tracks upload progress, creates a job via the backend, and navigates to the results page upon success.
frontend/src/hooks/useActor.ts: Custom hook that creates and caches an ICP backend actor (authenticated or anonymous) using TanStack Query, and invalidates dependent queries whenever the actor changes.
frontend/src/hooks/useInternetIdentity.t: Implements an Internet Identity authentication context provider and hook, managing AuthClient creation, login/logout flow, and identity persistence with status tracking.
frontend/src/hooks/useQueries.ts: Defines TanStack Query hooks for fetching jobs (with polling), listing user jobs, creating jobs, processing jobs, and retrying failed jobs against the ICP backend actor.
frontend/src/index.css: Global stylesheet that imports Google Fonts, sets up Tailwind CSS layers, and defines a comprehensive set of CSS custom properties for light and dark themes using a warm cream/charcoal editorial palette.
frontend/src/lib/pencilSketchUtils.ts: Defines the four-stage pencil sketch pipeline metadata (labels, descriptions) and implements canvas-based image processing utilities (grayscale conversion, Sobel edge detection, Gaussian blur, pencil noise) used to generate sketch stage data URLs.
frontend/src/main.tsx: Application entry point that mounts the React app with QueryClientProvider and InternetIdentityProvider wrappers around the root App component.
frontend/src/pages/Contact.tsx: Contact page with a validated contact form (name, email, message) that simulates submission with a toast notification, alongside contact info and social media links.
frontend/src/pages/Documentation.tsx: Documentation page rendering a structured reference manual for the app, including sections on the four-stage sketch pipeline, API endpoints with code blocks, and architecture details.
frontend/src/pages/Home.tsx: Home page featuring a hero section with a scroll-to-upload CTA, a 4-stage sketch preview grid with styled cards, and an embedded UploadInterface component.
frontend/src/pages/HowItWorks.tsx: How It Works page displaying the four pencil sketch stages in a 2Ã—2 image grid with Roman numeral overlays, stage names, and descriptions, plus a CTA link.
frontend/src/pages/Results.tsx: React page component that displays job results for a pencil sketch generation job, handling loading, error, failed, and success states with a gallery view and retry functionality.
frontend/tailwind.config.js: Tailwind CSS configuration defining custom fonts, an extended color palette (gold, ink, paper, graphite), border radius, and enabling typography, container-queries, and animate plugins.
project_state.json: Project state metadata file tracking version 5 of a fix-and-redeploy request, listing five pending action items covering TypeScript/React errors, Motoko backend errors, GalleryView fixes, HowItWorks page fixes, and redeployment.
